sorular.soru: What is the maximum allowed for brommobielen outside built-up areas?

feedback.metin: A brommobiel is a moped on more than two wheels. The brommobiel has bodywork and is designed for a maximum allowed speed of 45 km/h. The maximum allowed speed of 45 km/h applies to brommobielen on roads both inside and outside built-up areas, unless signage indicates otherwise.

sorular.soru: How fast are you allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: The speed limit is 80 km/h on roads outside built-up areas, except for autowegen, motorways, or anywhere a lower speed limit applies.

sorular.soru: You only have driving licence B and want to hire a moving van. What is the allowed maximum authorised mass including load?

feedback.metin: Driving licence B allows you to drive vehicles with a maximum authorised mass of up to and including 3500 kilograms. Pay attention to this when hiring a moving van. It often happens that the original maximum authorised mass of moving vans is lowered so that they may be driven with driving licence B. Due to the high unladen weight of the van, the loading capacity is often minimal. If you overload the van, you will be fined.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum distance between two motor vehicles when towing?

feedback.metin: Drivers of motor vehicles are not allowed to tow other vehicles if the distance between the 2 vehicles is more than 5 metres.

sorular.soru: What is the speed limit here at 4:00 PM?

feedback.metin: You are driving on a motorway with a speed limit of 100 km/h at this time of day. The A-1 sign indicates a speed limit of 90 km/h, but the bottom sign indicates that this speed limit only applies when the road surface is wet.
